Text: I am downloading right now from ETTV, VTV and EZTV and none of them seem have fast DL speed. :/

@c0ldpr0xy You know, I use uTorrent and sometimes I find that when you're downloading a torrent that clearly has a lot of current seeders and leechers but is still inexplicably slow, it can help to stop the torrent and then start it again. (That's how it seems to me, anyway - it's possible I'm just trying to convince myself of this to give myself a sense that I have more control over this kind of thing than I actually do. It can't hurt to try it, though!)

@fazioh318: Except when you're in Canada and your ISP gives you 8 mbit download 0.3 mbit upload. :( Chances are, you grabbed the torrent within a few hours of being available. There's so many people downloading that the upload from a lot of us can't cover it. Be patient and your download speed will go up in no time. Once I had enough data to reach 30 KB/s upload, my download shot up to 200 KB/s.
